abstract: He is in final negotiations for a job at another restaurant, the name of which he said he is not ready to reveal.
snippet: He is in final negotiations for a job at another restaurant, the name of which he said he is not ready to reveal.
lead_paragraph: Chris Cipollone, the chef at Tenpenny in the Gotham Hotel in Midtown, has left.

headline.main: Chris Cipollone, Citing Low Pay, Leaves Tenpenny for a New Job
